monster.name: Desther

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Desther is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks).

trait.name: Spirit Guardians
trait.text: An affected creature's speed is halved in the area, and when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 2d8 necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

action.name: Sacred Flame
action.text: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC14) or take 2d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

action.name: Command
action.text: You speak a one-word command to two creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC14) or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesn't understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it.

action.name: Hold Person
action.text: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC14) or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

action.name: Mass Healing Word
action.text: As you call out words of restoration, up to 6 creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points equal to 1d4 + 6.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Frulam attacks twice with her halberd.

action.name: Halberd
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monster.spells: sacred flame, command, hold person, mass healing word, spirit guardians

monster.name: Thran Acolyte

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The mage is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks).

action.name: Magic Missile
action.text: You create 4 glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4+1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

action.name: Misty Step
action.text: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

action.name: Hold Person
action.text: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC13) or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

action.name: Shocking Grasp
action.text: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

monster.spells: shocking grasp, magic missile, hold person, misty step
